---
title: "Getting Started"
---

## Creating a Workspace

1.  Visit <https://coder.dreamlab.ucsb.edu>.
2.  Click "UCSB Login" and log in using UCSB SSO (via Google).
3.  Click the button to create a Dreamlab Workspace.
4.  On the "Create Workspace" page:
    *   Give it a name.
    *   Check "I understand the usage policies".
    *   Select additional software for automatic installation (Rstudio, JupyterLab, Visual Studio Code (Desktop), Visual Studio Code (Web)).
    *   Click "Create Workspace".
    *   Creation may take a few minutes.

## Workspace Lifecycle

*   **Automatic Shutdown:** Workspaces shut down after four hours of inactivity.
*   **Resuming:** Click the "Start" button in the upper-right corner of the workspace page.
*   **Deletion:** Select "Delete" from the drop-down menu in the upper-right corner. **Warning: Deleting the workspace deletes all files.**
